title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Video-Based Knowledge Co-construction for Pre-service Language Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary language education theories and general comprehension of primary curriculum standards
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can derive at least three science-integrated language education strategies by analyzing video simulation materials in collaboration with peers and mentors
Learners can reflectively evaluate their teaching delivery through recorded videos and identify at least five instructional skill improvements
Learners can perform science vocabulary instruction demonstrations with at least 80% participation based on peer assessment feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
